name: aframe-lsystem-component
description: L-System/LSystem component for A-Frame to draw 3D turtle graphics. Using Lindenmayer as backend.

scripts.dev: npm run dist; cp dist/aframe-lsystem-component.js examples/libs/aframe-lsystem-component.js; cp node_modules/aframe/dist/aframe-master.js examples/libs/aframe.js
scripts.dist: webpack --module-bind worker-loader && webpack --config webpack.config.esnext.js --module-bind worker-loader && cp dist/aframe-lsystem-component.js dist/aframe-lsystem-component.min.js
scripts.preghpages: shx rm -rf gh-pages && shx mkdir gh-pages && shx cp -r examples/* gh-pages
scripts.ghpages: npm run dev && npm run preghpages && ghpages -p gh-pages

author: Tom Brewe <tom@nylkiway.net>
